short_summary: The project is to further build national capacities on radon awareness, organizing, and service delivery to respond to the radon cancer risk.
description: The Radiation Protection Bureau supports national capacities in radon awareness which include sustainable partnerships, public education, and advocacy within radon organizations and in the general public. This program supports healthy indoor air environments, ongoing public awareness, [occupation]", national capacity and partnership building. Organising, which includes national stakeholder network, campaign grants, and national policy analysis. Service delivery which includes the support of national radon training centre, cutting technologies for detecting radon, setting up national systems for monitoring radon, supporting programs for community education through service delivery.(
